column5: Hey folks.  Iwas talking to a friend today and she tells me that she catches rainbow, brown and brook trout from here parent dock.  I have fished this stretch of water all my life and never caught or heard of a brown trout being caught.  So I wanted to send her a photo of both a brown trout and brook trout to make sure the story is correct.  So if any one has a nice side shot of a brook trout and a brown trout I could use to send her that would be great.    Ian
thanks just what I need.  If I right click on pictures then click on properties i should be able to cut and paste in an email to her correct?    Ian
you should have to save as first then email unless you send her a link to them
as a side note Bill I live an hour north of Barrie and would love to blow the 12 year dust of my fly rod LOL    Ian
I had to read that twice
Damn you are good!  Terry get your mind  orb the g
Terry TerryTerry LOL  I guess I could have worded that a little better:oops: .  Havent used my Fly rod in 12 years due to the lack of productive trout fishing nearby.  Is that better  LOL
Lots of productive trout fishing in and around Barrie man    Gotta go find it.
Bill I just looked at your flickr page. Some really beautiful looking fish.
Thanks man..  That's about 1% of what I've got on my computer, lol!
Ask a guy named Frank,he has some real beauties.
